data.meta_description: Prints of The King and Queen of Siam, 1898. Portrait of King Chulalongkorn (1853-1910). Our beautiful Wall Art and Photo Gifts include Framed Prints
data.text:
Heritage Images Photo Prints and Wall Art

The King and Queen of Siam, 1898. Creator: Christian Wilhelm Allers

The King and Queen of Siam, 1898. Portrait of King Chulalongkorn (1853-1910) and his agnatic half-sister and consort Saovabha Phongsri (1864-1919). Der Konig und die Konigin von Siam. From " Rund um die Erde" [Round the Earth], written and illustrated by C. W. Allers. [Union Deutsche Verlagsgesellschaft, Stuttgart, 1898]. Heritage Images features heritage image collections. Â© The Print Collector/Heritage Images

Media ID 19780339

Allers Andresen Bamp W Brother C W Allers Christian Wilhelm Christian Wilhelm Allers Half Brother His Majesty Husband King Of Siam Rund Um Die Erde Siam Siamese Sister Thai Thailand Union Deutsche Verlagsgesellschaft Willy Willy Allers Wives Chulalongkorn Half Sister Rama V

Framed Prints

Bring the rich history of Siam's royal past into your home with our exquisite Framed Prints from Media Storehouse. This captivating portrait, titled "The King and Queen of Siam, 1898," features King Chulalongkorn (Rama V) and his agnatic half-sister and consort, Saovabha Phongsri. Created by renowned photographer Christian Wilhelm Allers, this vintage image transports you back in time, offering a glimpse into the regal elegance of the late 19th century. Add this stunning piece to your decor and relive the grandeur of the Siamese monarchy.

Photo Prints

Step back in time with this exquisite Media Storehouse photographic print, featuring a captivating portrait of King Chulalongkorn and his consort, Saovabha Phongsri of Siam, taken in 1898. This stunning image, captured by renowned photographer Christian Wilhelm Allers, offers a rare glimpse into the royal court of the past. Add an air of elegance and historical charm to your home or office with this beautiful, museum-quality print from Heritage Images.

Poster Prints

Step back in time with our exquisite Media Storehouse Poster Print featuring the royal couple of Siam, King Chulalongkorn and Queen Saovabha Phongsri, captured in a stunning portrait by renowned photographer Christian Wilhelm Allers in 1898. This elegant black and white image offers a captivating glimpse into the rich history and culture of Siam, now known as Thailand. Perfect for adding a touch of history and sophistication to any room in your home or office.

Jigsaw Puzzles

Step back in time with the Media Storehouse Jigsaw Puzzle featuring the captivating portrait of King Chulalongkorn and Queen Saovabha Phongsri of Siam, 1898. This intriguing puzzle showcases an iconic image by Christian Wilhelm Allers, capturing the regal elegance of the King and his agnatic half-sister and consort. Immerse yourself in the rich history of Siam as you piece together this beautiful puzzle, perfect for history enthusiasts, puzzle collectors, or anyone seeking a challenging and rewarding pastime.
